title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, April 3, 2015
description: Airing on Friday, April 3, 2015: First up, we talk to Mark Paterson, the lead motion designer for Archer, about the elaborate Easter Eggs hidden throughout the show. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech? It's time for Silicon Tally. This week, Aminatou Sow, co-founder of Tech Lady Mafia and co-host of the podcast Call Your Girlfriend, takes on host Ben Johnson. And the EU is preparing an anti-trust suit against Google for favoring its own sites in search results. The fine could be up to 6 million dollars. Alistair Barr, reporter for the Wall Street Journal, says google investors are more worried about the toll on Google’s business strategy.
